title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Juan Mata may leave Old Trafford this summer
description: All the latest Manchester United  transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Wednesday, January 17.
content: Juan Mata could leave United for free in the summer as the club are yet to activate a 12-month option to extend his contract, says the Daily Mail.The Spain international has only been a bit-part player at Old Trafford under manager Jose Mourinho this season.Meanwhile, Henrikh Mkhitaryan is nearing a move to Arsenal in a swap deal with Alexis Sanchez after accepting he has no future at United, according to reports in Daily Mail.The Armenia playmaker has struggled to get regular game time at the Theatre of Dreams so far this campaign.Elsewhere, Barcelona right-back Aleix Vidal may quit the Nou Camp in the January transfer window, reports Estadio Deportivo.Vidal is believed to be interesting United, as well as rivals Liverpool.And finally, Mourinho wants the club to do all it can to keep hold of midfielder Marouane Fellaini, says The Sun.The Belgium international, 30, who is understood to be interesting West Ham United, has a contract with the Red Devils that runs out this summer.
